sentences.sentence: I am a committee member of the Philatelist Association of our university.
sentences.translation: 我是我们大学里集邮家协会的成员。

sentences.sentence: The history of the post office is rarely of interest to anyone but the uniquely eager philatelist.
sentences.translation: 一提到邮局的历史，除了那些特别痴迷的集邮家外，恐怕很难再有谁会感兴趣。

sentences.sentence: According to an 1876 edition of the magazine Philatelist, timbromania was the earlier word that Herpin was attempting to oust.
sentences.translation: 根据一本1867年版的《集邮》杂志，timbromania是海尔宾试图取代的单词。
